abstract: John Miller, whose trajectory has veered between journalism and law enforcement, is about to join the well-ballasted CBS "Early Show."
snippet: John Miller, whose trajectory has veered between journalism and law enforcement, is about to join the well-ballasted CBS "Early Show."

headline.main: John Miller to Join CBS, Bolstering 'The Early Show'
headline.print_headline: John Miller to Join CBS, Bolstering ‘The Early Show’
